MP4SUX: "Same quality that I have become known for" 

Yeah, the quality of using a lower than required standard bitrate, and it shows as everything you upload has heavy mpg artifacting and a screwball file size (there is a reason FMQ and AFG xvid avi's are 350 megs and not 280!)

Seriously, 768Kb/s is NOT suitable for live action video. It's barely suitable for animation. 768kb/s is considered low quality according to every encoding chart out there. Good quality doesn't start till 1000-1200kb/s. When I transcode, I use 1200-1500 depending on the frame rate.


MP4SUX: "About once a month somebody says something bad. Don't know why ..."

Because you don't know how to properly encode and post low quality video, that's why.
